pageContext.claim: “I don't think you'll need that because I really think we're in, you know, extremely good shape. We're prepared for anything and we could always do that at a later date if we need, it but I don't think we need that at this stage.”
pageContext.analysis: The government was very aware that it was not prepared for a pandemic. A simulation run during early 2019 documented the confusion and chaos that would ensue if a real public health emergency struck.
